East Dunbartonshire, West Dunbartonshire and Helensburgh & Lomond
Inverness & Nairn and Moray, Badenoch & Strathspey
NOTICE_DATA.n2016:TENDERER_NUTS: East Ayrshire and North Ayrshire mainland

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C03

TI_TEXT.P: Услуги по поддържане на други зелени площи

TITLE.P: Grounds Maintenance Services and Emergency Works

SHORT_DESCR.P: To carry out cyclical grounds maintenance services and emergency works e.g. snow clearing, storm damage for our developments throughout Scotland. Tender is split into 3 geographic areas and 19 lots.

TITLE.P: East area — Borders — 8 sites

SHORT_DESCR.P: Grounds maintenance services and emergency works such as snow clearing, storm damage for 8 sites as detailed in the spreadsheet "Grounds Maintenance Areas and Lots".

INFO_ADD.P: Bidders may only bid for lots within one geographic area. Either the East, North or the West.

TITLE.P: East area — Edinburgh and West Lothian — 12 sites

SHORT_DESCR.P: Grounds maintenance services and emergency works such as snow clearing, storm damage for 12 sites as detailed in the spreadsheet "Grounds Maintenance Areas and Lots". please note that 4 of these sites will not form part of this contract until April 2020 and another site in April 2019.

INFO_ADD.P: Bidders may only bid for lots within one geographic area. Either the East, North or West.
